study_plan_entry.title: Efficient Synthetic Routes Towards Bioactive Molecules

free_text.Content: The following topics will be mainly targeted by this lecture:[br/][li] The concept of synthetic strategy optimization[br/][li] Diversity oriented synthetic approaches[br/][li] Convergent and building block based synthetic tactics[br/][li] Differences in planning of process and discovery routes[br/][li] Application of modern sustainable and efficient catalytic methods in multi-step synthesis
free_text.Keywords: Natural Products, Disconnection approach, Synthetic efficiency
free_text.Form of examination: Oral presentation together with oral exam
